Edges-Bard -- Male Human Heroic Bard
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d12 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (Common): (sma) d8 Repair: (sma) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d10 Notice: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d12 Stealth: (agi) d6
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
Ugly: -1 Persuasion
Armor Interference: -4 Performance and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Sharp Tongued: May substitute Performance for Taunt
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 10; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (7 points): Bard; Countersong; Danger Sense; Dirge Of Doom; Inspire Heroics; New Powers; Power Points Hindrances: Anemic; Thin Skinned; Ugly; Vengeful Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Bard: Has Arcane Background (Bard), Armor Interference, and Sharp Tongued features
Inspire Heroics: R8" May spend Benny 1/encounter to grant 5 Trait or damage rerolls
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Combat
Parry: 5 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d8+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Countersong: R5" Self and allies gain reroll to resist and recover from spells
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP Tran) R8" Target gains +1 Trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 Trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target gains free reroll 1/rd (Raise 1/action) or suffers -2 penalty; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Divination: (5 PP Divi) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information (+3 PP Contact gives advice)
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Mind Reading: (2 PP Divi) R8" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg) (+2 PP Self views entire scene or related memories)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP Conj) R8" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +4 PP Target gains 2 combat edges)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Dirge Of Doom: R10" May inflict -2 on foe Soak roll, Trait reroll, or damage reroll
